item.description:
This month we have a special presentation by Karen Macdeo and the topic will be on the new Creative Cloud.

More details to come ... stay tuned!!

 

UPDATE ...

Due to circumstances beyond our control we will not have a presentation tomorrow night (Thursday). Our presenter has had to cancel, she has pneumonia and will not be able to make it to the meeting.

So ... IT'S PARTY TIME!!

Please bring a dish or something to share with everyone!!

If you have a wish list of what you would like to see presented at future meetings you could bring that with you as well.

 

For those of you who can't make it, Penny and I would like to wish you and your families the happiest of holidays ... we hope to see you back in 2013!!

 

Happy Holidays!!
item.name: December's Manchester Adobe User Group Meeting ... UPDATE!
